name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch rabbitmq-shovel-to-solace.md --exec "claat export -o temp/ rabbitmq-shovel-to-solace.md && openfiles -c claat -t | xargs kill && cd temp/rabbitmq-shovel-to-solace && claat serve"
